remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow1 .  The p-adic valuation of the size of ` S ` is equal to the number of excess powers of ` P ` in ` ( # `` X ) / ( P ^ N ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow1.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
sylow1.f $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow1.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
sylow1.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
sylow1.d $e |- ( ph -> ( P ^ N ) || ( # ` X ) ) $.
sylow1lem.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow1lem.s $e |- S = { s e. ~P X | ( # ` s ) = ( P ^ N ) } $.
sylow1lem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( # ` S ) e. NN /\ ( P pCnt ( # ` S ) ) = ( ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) - N ) ) ) $.
$d .+ s $.
$d G s $.
$d N s $.
$d P s $.
$d X s $.
